trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Needles
There were no other sightings in Needles on or around July 24th 2010
divs: sighting detailson july 24th i met my friend [friends name removed cms\dr] at moabi park to go fishing. we launched the boat & was about a 1\2 mile past the bridge on interstate 40 when i looked up & saw a big light comming down at about a 90 degree angle & i yelled at [friends name removed cms\dr],"look" & we watched it come down at a very fast speed & the light was about 1000 feet from the ground it faded in color & disappeared from sight.the light came down right over interstate 40. this was only about 1\2 mile away from us, very clear to us. [friends name removed cms\dr] said what was that! i said that was a ufo because we don't have anything like that.this all happened in about 15 second. there was traffic on interstate 40 so i presume somebody else saw it to, they would have to be going west tho.
Summary: Very bright light comming out of sky toward the ground.
